column4: So I am looking for any possible suggestions. I am getting quite desperate. Not having sound is a pretty major issue for me.
ALSA or Pulseaudio, I can't tell
Try that first and let us know back on this channel
What Architecture do you run? I.E: Amd64 etc
Goto System > System Monitor and select the "System" tab
Did you ever find out what processor you're running?
I see you have alsa-base 1.0.18rc3 - Did you see that there is a full development for 1.0.18.dfsg-1ubuntu8 ?
Also make sure you have alsa-utils 1.0.18-1ubuntu11
To the right of the repo name does it show the version?
